Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: DFS Showdown GTO Portfolio Builder

Full modular implementation of GTO portfolio optimization for DraftKings
Showdown \(1 CPT + 5 FLEX\). Includes Monte Carlo simulation with Gaussian
copula correlations, archetype-based player correlation system, lineup
enumeration, ownership-weighted field generation, and true portfolio EV
computation with self-competition modeling.

Key feature: resample_per_sim field mode that samples a new opponent field
histogram each simulation via multinomial sampling, providing more stable
and accurate EV estimates without the cost of regenerating full lineups.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add hierarchical game-environment simulation and player effects layer

Implements variance decomposition from correlation_config_v2.json to create
game-state-dependent player outcomes. QBs \(game_share=0.82\) now swing
dramatically with game environment while skill players \(game_share=0.11\)
remain individually driven. This produces realistic CPT diversity matching
professional simulators.

Changes:
- engine.py: Score-space game environment decomposition that shifts player
  scores based on per-team game factors, smooth p25 floor extrapolation
- pipeline.py: Wire variance_decomposition through to simulation, build
  game_shares and team_indices from archetype mapping
- cli.py: Add --effects-file, --sim-config, --spread, --game-total options,
  increase default shortlist from 500 to 2000
- data/effects.py: New pre-processing layer for per-player correlation and
  distribution modifiers from unified_player_effects.json
- pre_processing_layer/: Effect configs and simulation parameters

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
